mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Doménech y Montaner, Luis (Spanish architect, 1849-1923) [work]

mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Noucentistes ideas of simplicity and purity of lines are observed in the simplifications of the pillars, balusters and capitals. This change of language has been identified as a possible involvement of his son in the design of the work. -- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Llu%C3%ADs_Dom%C3%A8nech_i_Montaner [work]
